.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ClaimsPrincipalPermission extends System.Object implements class System.Security.IPermission, class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission

type ClaimsPrincipalPermission = class interface IPermission interface ISecurityEncodable interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 表示使用 实施的权限，以确定对资源的访问是否应授予活动原则。

span.span: Represents a permission that uses a implementation to determine if access to a resource should be granted to the active principal.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类提供了使用执行命令性访问检查的能力配置的应用程序。The class provides the capability to perform imperative access checks by using the that is configured for an application. 通过调用方法或静态方法，可以提供对从执行路径中的资源为声明身份验证管理器定义的授权策略根据代码的保护。By invoking the method or the static method, you can provide protection to resources from within the execution path of your code according to the authorization policy defined for your claims authentication manager. 声明性的访问权限检查可以通过使用执行类。Declarative access checks can be performed by using the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类使用情况下配置的声明授权管理器下设置属性。The class uses the claims authorization manager configured by the that is set under the property. 这是在所有情况下，即使在其中未使用 WS 联合身份验证; 的方案中，则返回 true例如，活动 (WCF) Web 应用程序和控制台应用程序。This is true in all cases, even in scenarios where WS-Federation is not used; for example, active (WCF) Web applications and Console applications. 您可以指定的声明授权管理器配置中或以编程方式。You can specify the claims authorization manager either in configuration or programmatically. 若要在配置文件中指定的声明授权管理器，设置[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)元素下的[ <identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)元素，并确保此标识配置通过引用[ <federationConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)运行时加载的元素 （例如，通过设置`identityConfigurationName`属性)。To specify the claims authorization manager in a configuration file, set the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under an [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element and ensure that this identity configuration is referenced by the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element that is loaded by the runtime (for example, by setting the `identityConfigurationName` attribute). 若要以编程方式设置声明授权管理器，提供的处理程序事件。To set the claims authorization manager programmatically, provide a handler for the event. 某个级别上提供的功能类似于基于角色的访问检查 (RBAC) 通过提供类; 但是，类执行检查，依据提供活动的主体的声明。On one level, the functionality provided by is similar to the role-based access checks (RBAC) provided through the class; however, the class performs checks based on the claims presented by the active principal. 这使更多粒度比通过纯 RBAC，其中许多权限通常收集单个角色下可用。This enables far more granularity than is available through pure RBAC, where many permissions are typically collected under a single role. 也许，更重要的是，基于声明的授权可实现更好地分离业务逻辑和授权策略，因为可以在代码中对资源的特定操作需要管理员权限和后端策略可以用于配置的声明提供实体都必须拥有才能满足此要求。Perhaps, more importantly, claims-based authorization enables better separation of business logic and authorization policy because permission can be demanded for a specific action on a resource in code and back-end policy can be used to configure which claims the presenting entity must possess in order to satisfy the demand. RBAC，喜欢与代码访问安全性实现的派生的类不同，它是执行基于用户的访问检查，类，并使用堆栈审核，以确保代码的所有调用方已被授予权限， 执行其检查仅在当前主体上的。Like RBAC, performs a user-based access check, that is, unlike code access security implemented by classes that derive from the class and use a stack walk to ensure that all callers of the code have been granted a permission, performs its check only on the current principal. 静态方法检查指定的操作对指定资源的访问权限。The static method checks access for a specified action on a specified resource. 资源和操作是两个字符串，并且通常是 Uri。The resource and action are both strings and are typically URIs. 此外可以初始化的实例操作和资源以及调用方法。You can also initialize an instance of with an action and a resource and call the method. 构造函数仅采用单个资源和操作，尽管对象可以通过组合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 通过使用这些方法创建的权限可能包含多个资源操作对。A permission created by using these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs. 这两种方法通过调用来确定访问方法已配置的声明授权管理器与组成活动的主体 ()，该资源和操作。Both methods determine access by invoking the method of the configured claims authorization manager with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action. 它们将引发如果当前主体无权对资源; 执行操作，否则，执行将继续。They throw a if the current principal is not authorized to perform the action on the resource; otherwise, execution proceeds. 情况下，其中包含多个资源操作对，的权限中的资源操作对每个调用方法。In the case of a that contains multiple resource-action pairs, the method is invoked for each of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. 为调用成功，活动的主体必须为所有权限中的资源操作对授权。For the call to to succeed, the active principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用保护资源方法，方法，或声明。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method, the method, or a declaration. 每种情况下，已配置调用来评估当前主体针对指定的资源和操作。In each case, the configured is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的资源上指定的操作未授权当前主体则引发该异常; 否则为执行将继续。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#1)] 下面的 XML 演示使用自定义声明授权所需的最低配置管理器与类。The following XML shows the minimum configuration required to use a custom claims authorization manager with the class. 您必须最小值，声明两`system.identityModel`和`system.identityModel.services`内的部分``元素，然后指定在授权管理器中的[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)下的默认标识配置元素。You must, at a minimum, declare both the `system.identityModel` and the `system.identityModel.services` sections in the `` element and then specify your authorization manager in a [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element under the default identity configuration. 这将确保从默认的联合身份验证配置引用了授权管理器。This will ensure that your authorization manager is referenced from the default federation configuration. 或者，可以指定在其下授权管理器中指定的标识配置的名称`identityConfigurationName`的属性[ <federationConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md)元素。Alternatively, you can specify the name of the identity configuration under which your authorization manager is specified in the `identityConfigurationName` attribute of the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element. ```xml
```

span.span: <federationConfiguration>

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象初始化使用指定的资源操作对。The object is initialized with the specified resource-action pair. 您可以调用方法来执行访问检查。You can call the method to perform an access check. 构造函数仅采用单个资源和操作，尽管对象可以通过组合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 通过这些方法创建的权限可能包含多个资源操作对。The permission created through these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs.

span.span: Checks if the current principal is authorized to perform the specified action on the specified resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为指定的资源上指定的操作授权主体或引发异常。The principal must be authorized for the specified action on the specified resource or the exception is thrown. 已配置的声明授权管理器的方法调用使用了组成活动的主体 ()，该资源和操作。The method of the configured claims authorization manager is invoked with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用保护资源方法。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method. 已配置的声明授权管理器调用来评估当前主体针对指定的资源和操作。The configured claims authorization manager is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的资源上指定的操作未授权当前主体则引发该异常; 否则为执行将继续。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#2)]

summary.span: 检查当前主体是否获得与当前实例关联的资源操作对的授权。

span.span: Checks if the current principal is authorized for the resource-action pairs associated with the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为所有与此实例关联的资源操作对授权当前主体或引发异常。The current principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs associated with this instance or the exception is thrown. 构造函数仅采用单个资源和操作，尽管对象可以通过组合和方法。Although the constructor only takes a single resource and action, objects can be combined through the and methods. 通过这些方法创建的权限可能包含多个资源操作对。The permission created through these methods may contain multiple resource-action pairs. 方法将调用方法的已配置的声明授权管理器与组成活动的主体 ()，资源，并为每个包含的资源操作对操作在权限。The method invokes the method of the configured claims authorization manager with an composed of the active principal (), the resource, and the action for each of the resource-action pairs contained in the permission. 有关成功活动主体必须为所有权限中包含的资源操作对都授权。For the to succeed the active principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs that are contained in the permission. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用保护资源方法。The following example shows how to protect a resource by using the method. 已配置的声明授权管理器调用来评估当前主体针对指定的资源和操作。The configured claims authorization manager is invoked to evaluate the current principal against the specified resource and action. 如果指定的资源上指定的操作未授权当前主体则引发该异常; 否则为执行将继续。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#3)]

summary.span: 返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 一个新的 ，表示当前权限与指定权限的交集；或为 （如果 为 ，或者不是 的一个实例）。

span.span: A new that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission; or if is or is not an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的权限已在当前权限和指定权限中存在的资源操作对。The permission that is returned has only the resource-action pairs that were present both in the current permission and in the specified permission. 资源操作对存在于中只有一个或多个权限不包括在内。Resource-action pairs that existed in only one or the other of the permissions are not included. 有关成功的新权限，当前主体只需获得了普遍适用于当前权限和指定的权限的资源操作对授权。For a to succeed on the new permission, the current principal only needs to be authorized for the resource-action pairs that were common to the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所有当前权限中的资源操作对也都存在于指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all of the resource-action pairs contained in the current permission are also present in the specified permission. 如果`target`是`null`或者不是实例，则返回`false`。If `target` is `null` or is not an instance of , the returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的权限的所有资源操作对当前权限中存在的所有的资源操作对提供的指定的权限。The permission that is returned has all of the resource-action pairs that are present in the current permission and all of the resource-action pairs that are present the specified permission. 有关成功的新权限，当前的主体必须授权的所有当前权限中存在的资源操作对和所有存在于中的指定权限的资源操作对。For a to succeed on the new permission, the current principal must be authorized for all of the resource-action pairs that existed in the current permission and all of the resource-action pairs that existed in the specified permission.
